DOC.brief_summary: The purpose multi-center clinical trial determine safety efficacy HSO Toric IOLs correction aphakia reduction pre-existing refractive astigmatism .
DOC.brief_title: Comparison Aspheric Toric & Non-toric Aphakic Intraocular Lenses
DOC.criteria: Have diagnose cataract phacoemulsification extraction posterior chamber IOL implantation indicate Have least one eye meet range preoperative corneal cylinder specify study 's guideline , i.e . corneal cylinder least 1.0 D ( account change corneal cylinder due incision ) Have potential Best Corrected Visual Acuity 20/30 good implantation study lens Have clear intraocular medium cataract Have preoperative Best Corrected Visual Acuity equal 20/40 worse , without glare source Have atonic pupil physiologically small pupil either eye ( unable dilate least 4 mm ) Have irregular astigmatism operative eye , refractive cylinder result lenticular astigmatism operative eye Have corneal pathology potentially affect corneal topography , corneal abnormality expect reduce best correct visual acuity operative eye study period Have undergone previous refractive corneal surgery operative eye Have diagnose degenerative retinal disorder ( e.g . soft drusen , macular degeneration progressive retinal disorder ) operative eye predict cause future visual acuity loss level 20/30 bad postoperative followup time requirement study Eligibility criterion complete .
